title: I bought/rented a movie but didn't get the discount. Can I get it now? : BookMyShow Support Centre
body:
The offer has to be applied by clicking on 'Unlock offers or Apply Promo codes' post your desired selections.
The system shows conformation as
"Congratulations! You would have successfully availed your offer"
You shall see the discounted amount break up in the payment summary. Only after checking this should you proceed to make the balance payment.
In case you missed to do so, you will not be able to avail of the discount.
